comments:
20030107

I had an api information section in my schema source. I deleted this annotation 
in the source page. Going to the documentation page of the schema editor and 
selecting the last entry:

This is obviously a bug, but I think you could have achieved the same effect by 
leaving the section, but clearing the text in the text area. We should not 
generate sections that are blank (have only white space content).

Form pages were not written to expect sections to go away (it is enough to 
clear the description field). I added code to reset the combo box when the 
number of sections in the drop-down list is different from that in the model.

Fixed.
